thread.title: PREVIEW: Jimmy Carr, Mayflower Theatre, Southampton
thread.title_full: PREVIEW: Jimmy Carr, Mayflower Theatre, Southampton

title: PREVIEW: Jimmy Carr, Mayflower Theatre, Southampton
text:
POPULAR demand sees Jimmy Carr returning to Mayflower Theatre on Sunday after a sell-out show in April. Share article 
Jimmy’s been described as ‘the hardest working man in comedy’. Which, let’s face facts, is not that impressive. It’s like being the ‘Tallest Dwarf’ or the ‘Healthiest Glaswegian’. Really not that big a deal. However his show Funny Business is one you’re not going to want to miss. 
Limited tickets remain from 023 8071 1811 or mayflower.org.uk Promoted Stories PREVIEW: Jimmy Carr, Mayflower Theatre, Southampton Sorry, an error occurred.
